author: Mahita Gajanan
title: Ryan Goslingâ€™s Romantic Golden Globes Speech Made the Internet Swoon
text:
Ryan Goslingâ€™s Golden Globes acceptance speech melted hearts everywhere after he thanked his wife, Eva Mendes, for holding down the fort while he worked on La La Land .
â€œI just would like to try and thank one person properly, and say that while I was singing and dancing and playing piano and having one the best experiences Iâ€™ve ever had on a film, my lady was raising our daughter, pregnant with our second and trying to help her brother fight his battle with cancer,â€ Gosling said in his speech. â€œIf she hadnâ€™t taken all that on so that I could have this experience, would surely be someone else up here other than me to today. Sweetheart, thank you.â€
People online swooned over the real-life Feminist Ryan Gosling , with some drawing comparisons to his romantic role in The Notebook .
That @RyanGosling #GoldenGlobes speech gave me serious 'Notebook' feels. #ovaryexplosion

Ryan Gosling's speech just blew me away. Attractive, smart & so generous to his partner. What a man. #GoldenGlobes

I just got pregnant listening to Ryan Gosling?

Ryan Gosling just made my heart explode. #GoldenGlobes
